Hero.title: I create apps and websites.
Hero.description: I'm a Senior Front-end Developer specialized in building exceptional apps and websites.

About.title: About me
About.description: I'm a Senior Front-end Developer specialized in mobile development. My main stack includes React, React Native, Next.js, and Expo. I value code quality and creating an excellent user experience. I always strive to stay up-to-date with the latest technology trends, such as the growing adoption of React Native for web, desktop, and tvOS. I'm constantly learning and applying new practices to ensure the projects I work on are innovative, efficient, and deliver the best performance possible. If you're looking for a developer committed to excellence and passionate about cutting-edge technologies, let's connect!

Contact.subtitle: Next step?
Contact.title: Get in touch
Contact.description: While I'm not actively seeking new opportunities at the moment, my inbox is always open. If you have a question or just want to say hi, I'll do my best to get back to you!
